MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan, affecting properties in Llanerch Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.30PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network caused by third party damage and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05PM on 5th February 2021.
